import axios from'axios';var url='https://gamingzone-ptoject.herokuapp.com';// Home page API
export var fetchAllPosts=function fetchAllPosts(currentPage){return axios.get("".concat(url,"/").concat(currentPage));};// Mobile page API
export var fetchMobilePosts=function fetchMobilePosts(currentPage){return axios.get("".concat(url,"/mobile/").concat(currentPage));};// Computer page API
export var fetchComputerPosts=function fetchComputerPosts(currentPage){return axios.get("".concat(url,"/computer/").concat(currentPage));};// Science page API
export var fetchSciencePosts=function fetchSciencePosts(currentPage){return axios.get("".concat(url,"/science/").concat(currentPage));};// Search page API
export var fetchSearchedPosts=function fetchSearchedPosts(currentPage,query){return axios.post("".concat(url,"/search/").concat(currentPage),query);};// Dashboard API
export var fetchAllPostsDashboard=function fetchAllPostsDashboard(currentPage){return axios.get("".concat(url,"/dashboard/").concat(currentPage));};export var craetePost=function craetePost(newPost){return axios.post("".concat(url,"/dashboard/create"),newPost);};export var deletePost=function deletePost(id){return axios.delete("".concat(url,"/dashboard/delete/").concat(id));};export var editPost=function editPost(id,post){return axios.patch("".concat(url,"/dashboard/create/").concat(id),post);};
